thread.title: Diary, drug test results sought in Lapeer school terror case
thread.title_full: Diary, drug test results sought in Lapeer school terror case

author: Roberto Acosta | racosta1@mlive.com
title: Diary, drug test results sought in Lapeer school terror case
text: Court records show an attorney for the 15-year-old student's attorney requested the diary of the 14-year-old, all text messages between the trio, all video evidence and photographs collected by police, as well as copies and result of lab tests "which the people allege constitute the controlled substance methamphetamine."
